Bond [i]({T}: Until end of turn, target nonbonded creature adds this creature’s base power and toughness to its own, gains the following ability, and becomes bonded. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, target player mills a card. If a library has ten or fewer cards in it, this creature can’t be blocked this turn.
notes: 2.2.0: Changed the buff to unblockable so this just closes out games at that point.
